short_description: hypothesis test function to perform ztest analysis on a data set.
long_description: fastpath function to perform ztest analysis on a data set.

input_tables.name: InputTable
input_tables.description: The input table for ztest analysis.
input_tables.rDescription: The input table for ztest analysis

argument_clauses.name: FirstSampleColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the first sample column in z test
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the first sample column in z test

argument_clauses.name: SecondSampleColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the second sample column in z test
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the second sample column in z test

argument_clauses.name: SampleNameColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table column containing the names of the samples included in the z test. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table column containing the names of the samples included in the z test. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.

argument_clauses.name: SampleValueColumn
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table column containing the values for each sample member. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table column containing the values for each sample member. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.

argument_clauses.name: FirstSampleName
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the first sample included in the z test. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the first sample included in the z test. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.

argument_clauses.name: SecondSampleName
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the name of the second sample included in the z test. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the name of the second sample included in the z test. This argument is used when Input is in sample-value format.

argument_clauses.name: MeanUnderH0
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the mean under the null hypothesis
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the mean under the null hypothesis

argument_clauses.name: Alpha
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the value of alpha in hypothesis test function
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the value of alpha in hypothesis test function
